text:
Hi, all. 

I'm a full-time freelance content strategist for B2B and B2C companies, specifically in the fintech (blockchain & crypto,  finance, innovation, tech products) sector.

I love to spice up my content with visuals and infographics. Meeting deadlines and good communication are my core skills.

If you need well-planned and researched content with good infographics or visuals, do reach out to me. 

Talk soon.

text: hey Momal! do you have any experience with technical writing about GitHub, Jira, github apps or jira apps? we’re looking for someone with a strong technical background that can comfortably write to a developer/devops/site reliability engineer audience. if this sounds like you, send me a dm? TIA :slightly_smiling_face:

text: Hi Katie. I also came from the TV production world and now work in marketing. I was an associate producer for many years. I find a lot of overlap with storytelling & marketing. Now I’m a Growth Content Marketer for Omniscient Digital and I write B2B customer success stories.

text:
Hi Folks, I hope you all are safe from covid pandemic.

I'm professional freelance technical writer/copywriter/ affiliate product description writer having 2 years of experience, in hand. 

Other than that, I can write unique plagarism free quality contents on other niches as well such as DIY, Lifestyle, Entertainment.

If you want to write Landing Pages for your website, Your writer is here.

Having Strong hands over On-Page and off-Page SEO optimization.

If you want to optimize your content using SurferSeo, I am expertise over this as well.

If anyone of you need a talented writer for your firm or agency, Do let me know. I assure you to provide tremendous writing within given deadlines..
Thanks Alot!

text: hi folks! I'm a content strategist with 6+ years of experience, and I'm currently searching for a new role, preferably at a tech company. I have a healthy mix of agency/tech experience, specialize in b2b and brand comms, and am also a published writer with two books and an mfa under my belt, if that floats your boat! if there are any suitable roles open at your org, please pm me :blush:

text:
I am a world-class SEO Content Writer and Copywriter with exceptional experience in niches such as Health and Fitness, Finance, Online gaming, Technology, Cryptocurrency etc.

I write uniquely with a focus on quality and devotion to client requirements and content goals. My job as an SEO expert is primarily to improve and increase traffic on your website by enhancing the Search Engine Result Page.

I have been writing as an SEO Content Writer for the past three years with clients on Upwork and Fiverr. I have worked with different brands, companies, and individuals in various industries both online and offline.
You can check my LinkedIn <https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-olusoji-178444185/>

Question: However, I want to have a consistent or full-time remote work, assisting clients or companies as an SEO Content writer to achieve their content goals.

Please, how can I achieve this?
